name: Secret Habitat
description:
All donations make a difference and are very appreciated!
Questions? > https://twitter.com/Strangethink23

Aimlessly explore a procedurally generated island with 99 procedurally generated art galleries full of generated artwork and generated sound loop exhibits. Maybe you will find some meaning here. I don't know.

PRESS R FOR SCREENSHOT.
(Saved inside the .app file on Mac)

You can move around just using the mouse if you like, right mouse to walk. You can WASD or cursor key if you prefer, I'm cool with whatever.

You can turn on the tape machines with left click or E, you can jump with left click or space.

-- Latest update: v1.79 - Performance improvements.

See my other games/things > http://strangethink.itch.io/
